title: Saagaavaram Lyrics Uttama Villain Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Uthama Villain Saagaavaram Tamil Song Lyrics
Singer(s): kamal haasan, yazin nizar, Ranjith Iyyappan,
Lyrics : Kamal haasan.
Music: M Ghibran

Saagaavaram pol sogam unndoh
kelaai mannaa!!
Theeraa kadhayai kettpaar unndoh
kelaai mannaa!!

Kaniyar kaniththa
kanakku padi naam
kaanum ulagidhu
vatta pandhaam. (vatta pandhaam)

Vatta pandhai vattamadikkum
mattra pandhum
podhum aandae.
podhum aandae.

Maalaa oliyaam niyaayirum kooda
matttorr ugaththil pogum karindhae.

mulaithu murithdhum
thulirkkum vazhai-than
maranam kulle
vittadhu vidhaiye
(kelaai mannaa)

Vidhaithidum
mei pol oru uyirai
uyirthu vilangum
en kavidhai vilangum
kavidhai viangum

Vilungi thulangidum
vamsam vaazha
vaazhum naalil kadamai seyya
seyyul pol oru
kadhal vendum
kadhal vendum
seyyul pol oru- kadhal vendum

vendiyadhellam vaaitha oruvan
saavayum vendi seththa kadhaigal
aayiram unndu,
kelaai mannaa
